(1) Combination
--------------------------------------------------
 n   k = 0   k = 1   k = 2   k = 3   k = 4   k = 5
--------------------------------------------------
  0       1
  1       1       1
  2       1       2       1
  3       1       3       3       1
  4       1       4       6       4       1
  5       1       5      10      10       5       1
--------------------------------------------------
n =   0, sum =       1, 2^n =       1
n =   1, sum =       2, 2^n =       2
n =   2, sum =       4, 2^n =       4
n =   3, sum =       8, 2^n =       8
n =   4, sum =      16, 2^n =      16
n =   5, sum =      32, 2^n =      32
